basics.name: Kobus van der Merwe
basics.label: Curriculum Vitae - 2025-06
basics.summary: With 25+ years of experience delivering data platforms, MLOps pipelines and bespoke software solutions, I specialize in building scalable, production-grade systems across diverse industries. I bring deep expertise in Python, C#, Kubernetes, OpenShift, and DevOps, combined with strong foundations in distributed systems, data engineering, and real-time data processing. My background spans graph databases, fraud detection, and large-scale deployments, enabling me to design solutions that bridge research and production seamlessly. I thrive on solving complex problems and helping organizations unlock value through data and automation.
